item.title: JSON-for-VHDL
item.description: JSON-for-VHDL is a library to parse and query JSON data structures in VHDL. The complete functionality is included in a single synthesizable VHDL package, without special dependencies. It allows reading JSON from files and/or from (optionally encoded) stringified JSON generics. It is included in VUnit, for passing generics for arbitrary complexity from Python to the testbeches.
